title: Veggie gratin
ingredients: ['1 small cauliflower, cut into florets', '1 head of broccoli, cut into florets', '3 medium potatoes, peeled and diced', '4 carrots, peeled and sliced', '110g (4 oz) mushrooms, sliced', 'Sauce', '60g (2 oz) butter', '60g (2 oz) plain flour', '600ml (1 pint) milk', '110g (4 oz) grated cheddar cheese', '1 clove of garlic, minced', '1/2 teaspoon chopped jalapeno chillies', 'Topping', '2 slices wholemeal bread', '60g (2 oz) grated cheddar cheese']
